mapper.insert: INSERT INTO product(productNo, objectId, productType, cUserId, createDate, companyId, description, dutyTypeId, processNo, serialNumber, standardId, acreId) VALUE (#{productNo}, #{objectId}, #{productTypeId}, #{cUserId}, NOW(), #{companyId}, #{description}, #{dutyTypeId}, #{processNo}, #{serialNumber}, #{standardId}, #{acreId})
mapper.update:
UPDATE product
description = #{description},
dutyTypeId = #{dutyTypeId},
acreId = #{acreId},
standardId = #{standardId},
WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT p.id, p.productNo, pt.typeName, po.objectName,pdt.name AS dutyTypeName, ps.name AS standardName, sc.companyName,su.userName,p.createDate,p.owner,sc.areaId FROM product p LEFT JOIN product_object po ON p.objectId = po.objectId LEFT JOIN product_type pt ON p.productType = pt.typeId LEFT JOIN product_duty_type pdt ON p.dutyTypeId = pdt.typeId LEFT JOIN productive_standard ps ON p.standardId = ps.standardId LEFT JOIN sys_company sc ON p.companyId = sc.companyId LEFT JOIN sys_user su ON p.cUserId = su.userId WHERE p.id = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO product_object (objectName, openFlag, cUserId, unit, productType, createDate) VALUE (#{objectName}, #{openFlag}, #{cUserId}, #{unit}, #{productType}, NOW())
mapper.select: SELECT objectId, objectName, cUserId, unit, createDate, productType FROM product_object WHERE #{type} & productType > 0 AND openFlag = 1 ORDER BY createDate
